K10sf277_sc:wal1_0: bhavati sa samayo yad ayaṁ lokaḥ saṁvartate | saṁvartamāne loke yadbhūyasā satvā
K10sf277_sc:wal1_1: ābhāsvare devanikāye upapadyante | te tatra bhavanti rūpiṇo manomayā avikalā ahīnendriyāḥ
K10sf277_sc:wal1_2: sarvāṅgapratyaṁ gopetāḥ śubhā varṇasthāyinaḥ svayaṁprabhā vaihāyasagāminaḥ prītibhakṣāḥ
K10sf277_sc:wal2_0: tena khalu samayena mahāpṛthivī ekodikā bhavati ekārṇavā | tasyāṁ ekodikāyāṁ mahāpṛthivyāṁ
K10sf277_sc:wal2_1: ekārṇavāyāṁ vāyunā śaraḥ saṁmūrcchitaḥ saṁtanoti tadyathā pakvasya kṣīrasya śaraḥ
K10sf277_sc:wal2_2: saṁmūrcchitaḥ saṁtanoty evam eva tasyāṁ ekodikāyāṁ mahāpṛthivyāṁ ekārṇavāyāṁ vayunā
K10sf277_sc:wal2_3: śaraḥ saṁmūrcchitaḥ saṁtanoti | sa bhavati pṛthivīraso varṇasaṁpanno gandhasaṁpanno
K10sf277_sc:wal2_4: rasasaṁpannaḥ | tadyathā navanītam evaṁvarṇaḥ | tadyathā kṣaudraṁ madhv aneḍakam evamāsvādaḥ |
K10sf277_sc:wal3_0: bhavati sa samayo yad ayaṁ loko vivartate | vivartamāne loke satvā āyuḥkṣayāt karmakṣayāt
K10sf277_sc:wal3_1: puṇyakṣayād ābhāsvarād devanikāyāc cavitvā ihatye manuṣyasabhāgatām āgaccanti | te
K10sf277_sc:wal3_2: ’pi rūpiṇo pūrvavad yāvad dīrgham adhvānam tiṣṭhanti |
K10sf277_sc:wal4_0: tena khalu samayena na sūryacandramasau prajñāyete na rātridivasaṁ na māsaṁ ardhamāsaṁ
K10sf277_sc:wal4_1: na ṛtuṁ na kṣaṇalavamuhūrtaṁ prajñāyante … na strī na pumān | satvaḥ satva ity ekasaṁkhyāṁ gacchati |
K10sf277_sc:wal5_0: athānyatamo lolupajātīyaḥ satvaḥ aṁgulyagreṇa pṛthivīrasam āsvādayati | yathā yathāsvādayati
K10sf277_sc:wal5_1: tathā tathā pratikāṁkṣati | yathā yathā pratikāṁkṣati tathā tathā kabaḍiṁkāropakrameṇa praparibhuktaḥ |
K10sf277_sc:wal6_0: adrākṣur anyatame satvās taṁ satvaṁ kabaḍiṅkāropakrameṇa pṛthivīrasaṁ paribhuñjānam |
K10sf277_sc:wal6_1: dṛṣṭvā ca te ’pi satvā aṁgulyāgreṇa pṛthivīrasam āsvādayanti | yathā yathāsvādayanti
K10sf277_sc:wal6_2: pūrvavad yāvad kabaḍiṅkāropakrameṇa praparibhuktāḥ | yataś ca te satvā taṁ pṛthivīrasaṁ
K10sf277_sc:wal6_3: kabaḍiṅkāropakrameṇa praparibhuktās teṣāṁ kāye dṛḍhatvaṁ gurutvaṁ prajñāyete śubhavarṇo
K10sf277_sc:wal7_0: dharmatā khalu vāsiṣṭha andhakārasya loke prādurbhāvāt sūryacandramasau prajñāyete etc. as in 4.
